text: @RT_com "Cell membrane permeabilization has been shown to occur at frequencies within the 5G range". So, saying that people could be more vulnerable to viruses like Covid-19 when exposed to #5G radiation (as these viruses penetrate our cells), is not that far-fetched! Therefore, #Fuck5G!

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
